content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal Mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown) that crafts iron sticks and iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position unknown) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position unknown) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure that you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary items to smelt or craft before attempting to extract or inspect its inventory.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
